name: painlessly
content:

in a way that causes no physical pain: The laser beam heals the eye painlessly. A baby's hearing can now be tested painlessly with this device.
in a way that causes no problems: The varnish can be painlessly applied with a brush. I hope the event will proceed as smoothly and painlessly as possible. See
painless
